title: Monitor support arm

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a monitor support arm, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a first perspective view of the monitor support arm of the invention;
FIG. 2 is a second perspective view of the monitor support arm illustrated in FIG. 1;
FIG. 3 is a top plan view of the monitor support arm illustrated in FIG. 1;
FIG. 4 is a bottom view of the monitor support arm illustrated in FIG. 1;
FIG. 5 is a first side view of the monitor support arm illustrated in FIG. 1; and,
FIG. 6 is a reverse side view of the monitor support arm illustrated in FIG. 1.
The broken line showing of a monitor and support structure is included for the purpose of illustrating environment and forms no part of the claimed design.
